Table	Create Table
successionCandidates	CREATE TABLE `successionCandidates` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `planId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `employeeId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `readinessLevel` enum('imediato','1_ano','2_3_anos','mais_3_anos') NOT NULL,
  `priority` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `developmentPlanId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `gapAnalysis` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `developmentActions` text DEFAULT NULL,
  `performance` enum('baixo','medio','alto') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medio',
  `potential` enum('baixo','medio','alto') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medio',
  `comments` text DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=240001
